channel.title: [Request] I need help for stop lagging?
channel.description:
Do i have possible stop lag?
I have just run moparscape server i got 3gb ram and my network is 2mega..
If my server have 20 peoples my server is lagging so much.
Do i can set here like max players are 15 or some antilag system?

item.title: [Request] I need help for stop lagging?
item.dc:creator: @mage_ownt_u mage ownt u
item.description:
@mage_ownt_u wrote:

ok mai way to stop lagg is by stoping it on your comp if u expirence lag your players probly will
1)right hand conor of screen turn off all possible things that do not need to eb on right click then click exit
2)try restarting the client
3)restart your computer
4)control pannel and deleate all unessursery programs for better performance
5)for vista user go to control pannel battry options and click on high performace
i hope i helped you

Read full topic
